description: MCP server for interacting with Elasticsearch

ELASTICSEARCH_HOSTS.description: Comma-separated list of Elasticsearch hosts (e.g., https://localhost:9200)

ELASTICSEARCH_API_KEY.description: API key for Elasticsearch or Elastic Cloud authentication (recommended)

ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME.description: Username for basic authentication (alternative to API key)

ELASTICSEARCH_PASSWORD.description: Password for basic authentication (used with ELASTICSEARCH_USERNAME)
